name: database-frontend
description: A simple but powerful database frontend

scripts.build: php create_extensions.php && mkdir -p dist && browserify inc/app.js -o dist/app.js
scripts.watch: php create_extensions.php && mkdir -p dist && watchify --debug inc/app.js -o dist/app.js -v
